TextLibrary.Text: Darkhunter
You helped me, stranger. Why?
You helped me, stranger. Why?
You helped me, stranger. Why?
You helped me, stranger. Why?
Can't one traveler help another?
Can't one traveler help another?
Can't one traveler help another?
Can't one traveler help another?
He can... but he usually wants something in return. What do you want?
He can... but he usually wants something in return. What do you want?
She can... but she usually wants something in return. What do you want?
She can... but she usually wants something in return. What do you want?
I was sent by the Queen of Bart-
I was sent by the Queen of Bart-
I was sent by the Queen of Bart-
I was sent by the Queen of Bart-
Ahh...the undead problem. You want my help, no doubt?
Ahh...the undead problem. You want my help, no doubt?
Ahh...the undead problem. You want my help, no doubt?
Ahh...the undead problem. You want my help, no doubt?
We do. The Realms of Agaria are under siege, and we are afraid we won't be able to hold back the undead for much longer.
We do. The Realms of Agaria are under siege, and we are afraid we won't be able to hold back the undead for much longer.
We do. The Realms of Agaria are under siege, and we are afraid we won't be able to hold back the undead for much longer.
We do. The Realms of Agaria are under siege, and we are afraid we won't be able to hold back the undead for much longer.
As usual, the only time anybody seeks me out is when they are in dire trouble.
As usual, the only time anybody seeks me out is when they are in dire trouble.
As usual, the only time anybody seeks me out is when they are in dire trouble.
As usual, the only time anybody seeks me out is when they are in dire trouble.
Please, you have to help us. You'll be well rewarded.
Please, you have to help us. You'll be well rewarded.
Please, you have to help us. You'll be well rewarded.
Please, you have to help us. You'll be well rewarded.
The rewards I seek cannot be given by your Queen.
The rewards I seek cannot be given by your Queen.
The rewards I seek cannot be given by your Queen.
The rewards I seek cannot be given by your Queen.
I WILL help you though - for reasons that are my own. Meet me in Gallia. I have a few matters to attend to here first, then we shall travel back to Bartonia together.

Thank you.

Don't thank me yet.
